Maven Buddy - Smart Maven Dependency Search

Maven Buddy is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin that helps you quickly search and add Maven dependencies from Maven Central directly within your IDE. This plugin streamlines the process of finding and managing dependencies for your Java and Kotlin projects.

  • âš™ï¸ Configurable Formats: Switch between Maven XML, Gradle Kotlin DSL, and Gradle Groovy DSL formats
  • âš¡ Fast and Lightweight: Optimized search with minimal impact on IDE performance
  • ğŸ¯ Smart Search: Supports searching by groupId, artifactId, or keyword
  • ğŸ§© Context-Aware Completion: Get dependency suggestions while editing Gradle Kotlin script files
  • ğŸ”„ Version Updates: Easily upgrade existing dependencies to their latest versions

How to Use:

  1. Press Shift+Shift to open Search Everywhere
  2. Switch to the Maven Dependencies tab
  3. Type your search query (e.g., "spring-boot", "com.google.guice", or "guice:5.0")
  4. Select a result and press Enter to copy the dependency declaration to clipboard
  5. Paste the declaration into your build configuration file

Configuration Options:

Navigate to Settings â†’ Tools â†’ Maven Buddy to customize:

  • Dependency format (Maven XML / Gradle Kotlin / Gradle Groovy)
  • Maximum number of search results (1-100)
  • Auto-copy to clipboard setting
  • Search timeout configuration (1-60 seconds)
  • Debounce delay for real-time search (100-2000 milliseconds)
  • Manual trigger mode for precise control

Advanced Features:

Maven Buddy also provides context-aware completion for Gradle Kotlin script files. When editing .kts files, you'll get intelligent suggestions as you type dependency declarations. Additionally, you can use the "Update dependency to latest version" intention action to quickly upgrade existing dependencies.
